thread.title: Bernie Sanders responds to being Balenciaga's fashion muse
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders responds to being Balenciaga's fashion muse

author: Helena Horton
title: Bernie Sanders responds to being Balenciaga's fashion muse
text:
Bernie Sanders responds to being Balenciaga's fashion muse Bernie Sanders is the inspiration for Balenciaga's 2017-18 menswear collection Credit: WWD/REX/Shutterstock/EPA/MICHAEL REYNOLDS Helena Horton 7 February 2017 • 10:09am 
B ernie Sanders has responded after being informed that he is fashion house Balenciaga's muse for their latest menswear collection. 
Men strolled down the catwalk in Sanders chic; slightly shabby layers with the former Democrat presidential hopeful's logo repurposed to say Balenciaga. 
Chinos with white trainers and quilted jackets flung across shoulders, as well as a hearty amount of checked shirts all made an appearance at the fashion show. . @BernieSanders on being Balenciaga's latest muse: "Of my many attributes, being a great dresser is not one of them" https://t.co/8oCdahczU5 
T he unlikely fashion muse told CNN: “Of my many attributes, being a great dresser or a fashion maven is not one of them". 
He did not comment on whether or not he liked the collection. 
Bernie Sanders is popular with a large group of social media-savvy young people, so naturally many shared their excitement about the collection on Twitter. I just read this headline about 29573 times and it's still processing."Bernie Sanders on becoming a fashion icon" https://t.co/m8bNxpOEhj — Steve Kopack (@SteveKopack) February 5, 2017 . @BernieSanders Wow Cool line of @BALENCIAGA clothing. Strut your stuff Senator Sanders — Sameera Jade Daniels (@JadePinkSameera) February 5, 2017 I am so here for @BALENCIAGA showing @BernieSanders love!!! #Balenciaga — Maritza G (@MQueenSaucy) February 7, 2017 I will drop $$$ I don't have for a Bernie sanders @BALENCIAGA cap — W H O M ? (@ZeusAhlvin21) February 7, 2017 Nobody tell @BernieSanders how much @BALENCIAGA costs — Dauntless Dame (@ImTheAgent) February 7, 2017 
Is Bernie Sanders a fashion icon? Will we all be wearing 'Bernie chic' in the coming year? 
F or many, this probably seems like even more of an unlikely outcome than the Vermont Senator becoming President. Watch | Bernie Sanders prints out giant poster of Trump tweet 00:30
